description.value:
This sprig of berry-festooned holly and mistletoe doesn't wilt or rot. It can be used as a primal locus, and it grants a +1 item bonus to Nature checks while you wear it.

Activate—Anoint 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You squeeze juice from one of the berries and smear it onto a weapon made primarily of wood to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Weapon] on it, or onto a creature to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Body] on it.

Activate—Bind 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch the sprig, then a tree to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants] upon yourself, turning into a vine on the touched tree.
